>
[Miter of Communion](/Equipment.aspx?ID=570)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Divination" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=47" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Gods & Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=17) pg. 123 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Price** 800 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn headwear

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This ornate headgear comes in many different shapes and sizes, though most are elaborately decorated with motifs of the deity whose honor in which it was made. The miter brings you spiritually closer to your deity’s servitors, granting you a +2 item bonus to [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13) checks.
